p:
Participants in the brief intervention group participated in 2 individual face-to-face sessions and 2 individual booster telephone sessions. Based on Project TrEAT,
30 the content of the brief intervention sessions included elements used in the combined intervention, including information about alcohol and its effects as well as alcohol behavior change strategies (eTable 2 in Supplement 2). Face-to-face sessions occurred approximately 1 month apart, and telephone sessions occurred 2 to 3 weeks after each face-to-face session.
